values:
So i lost the love of my life. Right before homecoming. Everything is horrible. Im heartbroken beyond belief but trying to keep my spirits up. He wont even talk to me anymore... He ignores me. He wrote me a really bitchy not about how much he hates me. Damn i mustve done something horrible. I wish i knew what it was. But he wont tell me that either. I still went to homecoming though. && i had a blast. Im crushing on people, but one happens to be his best friend, Joe Daniels. So yeah. It kinda sucks. I cant do anything about anything right now. I wanna move on but i try and i cant. Everytime i see him i can literally feel my heart sinking. Its like one of those things that you see on tv, that you never think will be you, bc you just wanna have the perfect fairytale relationship. well i had that, and the perfect fairytale heartbreaking ending came right along with it. If i had my way, i would have him back. AT LEAST as i friend, i would settle. But for some reason he hates me and idky. I hate it. I hate him. But yet im in love with him. 
I hate alan more..
Hes the love of my life..
He also fucking killed me.
Thanks alot..
Yeah sry about the rambling but ineeded to get it out and idt anyone reads these anymore anyways.
kthnx

♥Tiffany♥ Comments mkay?

Period 1--Study Hall--Baker
Period 2--Health&Wellness--Berju
Period 3--PE--James
Period 4--Biology--Osterman
Period 5--W.Hist.--Gruver
Period 6--Algebra--Downing
Period 7--English--Walpole

Locker--H541

Do you have my classes????
comment if you do or hit me up or somethin'. 
7015882

So yesterday was pretty awesome for the most part. my mom had her stupid candle party so i was pretty much just cleaning and cooking and stuff all day. Then my sister showed up and kendra came over and yeah.............. Me and kendra made these yummy meat thingys lol they turned out pretty good. I decorated the plate :] Anyways. Derick and Kevin came over. Then Joe. We all went swimming like the entire time. It was pretty fun besides the fact kevin kept being a douche to me. >.< But yeah. W/e works. We made up dericks song and everything. Id rather not post it on here though. haha lol. But yeah. After everyone left me and Joeii hung out and talked and yeah. I guess it was pretty good. 
Then i came inside and fkn' James, Jimmy, and Jimmys cousin Adam came over. Then Brian showed up. Gahhh. >.< It was crazy. They stayed pretty late. I ended up with a hat outta the deal though lol. And me and Jimmy had "the talk" lmao like always. ^.^ Yeah. I missed that kid. >.< I stayed up till fkn' 6:30 in the morning talkin' to the damn kid though. lol old times.... yeah it was pretty cool. 
Today i went swimming againnnnn. >.< fun? I went to the Fkn' goodwill and got a new shirt. Hellz yeah. Lol its pretty awesome for $3.70 ha. lol We payed in change too lmao. I think the lady was really mad. So now im sitting here..with kendra...and finally got done getting ready for the lockin 2nite. Sooooo...i guess ill update after the lockin. It should be interesting. :)

♥ Tiffany ♥

Im glad i went to brittanys in a way. It took my mind off of alot. Im soo happy joeii and hailie are back together cuz' it makes me happy that my best friend is happy. :] and i know he'll read this and hes my favorite Lol, Honestly though. So at brits we TRIED to watch Without A Paddle but we ended up getting into a convo about ex's and what Brit missed this summer and yeah. We talked about Brad and Codey and yeah Brad called brittany and it was horrible. >.< but we made up for it and took some REALLY awesome pics ill be putting on my myspace soon. And yeah. We had funnnnn. But idreally know what else to say but im on 3way with Todd and Sam. sooooo ill write later. 
♥

Soo last night was pretty fun i guess you could say. Me, Kevin, Kendra, and Brian all chilled out here until Joeii and Tahnee came to get us for the movies. Kevin ended up going with us. We saw XMen 3 lol It was pretty awesome even though me, kendra, and Tahnee hadnt ever seen the 1st too. But it was good, ill admit. Lol. Soooo we were practicly the only ones in the theatre and me and kevin were messing around the whole time lol and like tickling each other and wrestling (THATS IT!!!!). And Yeah. I jumped a couple times. It was kinda scary lol. Thenn....i forget why but i got mad about something kendra said and i moved down a few rows and sat by myself for the end of the movie. I ended up clapping with my flip flops and getting extremely made fun of. haha. I was being immature and i loved it, Yes indeed. :] But anywayss. I tried climbing over the seats to the bottom but i only got like 2 and it DIDNT work out. Lol i almost fell so i stopped. Uhhmm...Then......i found my new favorite song. The really cool song off of Tokyo Drift. ^.^ Its pretty cool. We were dancing in the car. Then we came home. Uhhmm...Me and Joeii got in a "fight" in the middle of the street. Haha. It was funny. Errmm...They all left, Me and kevin ate dinner. Cole came over. We hung out. Yeah. That was about my night because then i got sick and yeahh. >.<
But i am getting ready to hang out with Joeii, Hailie, and Brittany so i guess i will write again later. 
Comment.

So Brad got mad and tried to bitch me out about talking about him in my last entry. Lol But oh well. I have every right since he talks about me right? :D Yup. 
So im sitting here with Kevin and Kendra..getting ready to get picked up by Joeii and Tahnee to go to the movies even though i just went like Saturday or something. But yeah. 
I guess ill just update as of what happened last night. 
So at like 1am or something like that Cole came over and we all went swimming. It was quite fun. ^.^ Then he left at like......uhmmm....2 someting ish. Idk. And me and Kendra came in and talked to Eric online and stuff. Yeah. Thats been pretty much my day. Pretty boring huh. Yeah i know. Buttttttt.....im gonna go...cuz'.....im bored...and Bradley just called me so yeah. Comments and such. 
♥

Yeah so last night was kinda fun at first but it all went downhill. John and me were talking on the phone and he was upset so i decided we should spend some time together and just get him outta the house and have fun. So thats what we did. We went to the mall and met up with Joeii, Tolentino, Tahnee, and Hailie?Yea. Well we were all having a great time. I got a new shirt and a necklace and stuf fand it was just really fun. Well me and Hailie ended up talking about Brad and how much of an asswhole he is to girls and i thought i had her convinced not to go out with the loser cuz it would kill me and joeii both. Well we ended up leaving them and me and john went to see click again at 10. so we saw kyle and we chilled and talked on the phone to james and then watched the movie. well i got a voicemail from hailie saying brad was bout to ask her out and she was going to say yes. So i called joeii and told him and yeah. drama drama drama. now brad and hailie might go out and its crazy and idk if ill be able to talk to her once she does cuz shes hurting joeii and hes my BEST FRIEND and i dont wanna see her and brad together cuz, well, thats bullshit for one. >.< Gahhhh. Idk i just hate drama. but enough of the drama. uhhhmm...
Yeah. So its sunday..cole comes home 2nite or 2mrrw and then we are gonna spend the day together!!!! And i cant wait. :) :) :) Im soooo excited for him to come backk, considering hes been in evansville all weekend. We dont go a whole weekend w/o seeing each other EVER lol its been weird. And kendras been gone all weekend too. Idk ill just be glad for this week cuz then friday is the lockin and alot of peopel got kicked out but unfortunatly the people i cant stand DIDNT. so hopefully it wont be too much drama and we can have some fun for a change cuz im planning on TRYING to make the best of this summer before school starts cuz im REALLY excited for school to start back up but i aint really dont much this summer so yeah. Im done cuz i dont have much more to say so i guess ill write later. 
~Pudding_Cup~

So i havent written in here since like forever. And joeii told me he wrote in his so i thought that id write in mine too. :) it all works. So lets see...I went out with...Codey for awhile. We broke up> Uhm...3x to be exact. Then i went out with brad whom i loved with all my heart but thats a completely different story. b/c now we are not aloud to talk to each other or anything of the sort so yeah. Thats over. Yeah. Ive been having relationship problems. It kinda sucks. I just wanna fine "the one" so then i can just be happy and move on from all this other past i have left and just not have to worry about anymore heartbreak and anything else. I did think Brad was the one..but then i also thought Dirk was too and that didnt turn out so well. There has been a few i thought was IT but it wasnt. But theres this guy now i like...and its not working out so well. Im not mentioning names just that hes been a good friend for about a year now. And ive known him since elementary school. I really like him, he really likes me, but for some reason he never wants to go out and its kinda annoying cuz im sick of just messing around i want a real relationship. but anyways. Enough rambling about guys. 
Family life really sucks. Nothing new. Yelling yelling, bitching, complaining, still living with my mom unfortunatly. Her new b/fs in and out. Her and my grandma both in and out of the hostpial. Yeah. Crazy. But oh well. 
Friends. well ive lost alot of them. from drama, and running their mouths, and me opening mine too unfortunatly. but just stupid stuff that you shouldnt loose friends over, i have. but hey. obviously they werent real friends then if they were going to let stuff like that happen again. ive also gained alot of really good friends that i wouldnt trade for the world..then some of them i just wanna kill lol but thats another story. But here latley ive been meeting up with alot of my old friends from last summer. Its kinda depressing. I really wish i really didnt have all those memories of last summer. But i think imma start usuing this more again. So i guess ill write later.
*~*Pudding_Cup*~*

Ok, well my mom is getting rid of our aol and we will probably be getting DSL or sumtin. Not sure yet. But shes doing it tonight so i dunno when the next time will be that im online. so if you wanna email me its wickedclownz4life2010@yahoo.com . Ok well i just wanted to let ya'll know that. So ill update this whenever i am able to be back online. 

love 
<3
x0xTif

Hey! wow its been forever since ive updated this. Idky i even am i just got really bored. Well lets see...

Family- sucks as usual, cept worse
Friends- pretty good. 
School- getting ready to start, hopefully a good year, but doubtful.
Guys- ugh..fuck them all. seriously. they can go to hell.

uhm...i think thats about it. wow. Reading what i wrote i realized how negative i am. hm. oh well lol. ha. its all good. well i might start writing in here off and on again. So ya. the only reason i like xanga better is cuz people actually comment. Ya. Learn!! lol

SO PLEASEEEEE COMMENT! IDC WHO IT IS OR WHAT IT SAYS JUST COMMENT! lol

x0x--Tif.

Ok..well i barley update this anymore, and instead ive brought my attention towards something new to me. 

Xanga.

So i got one.
And i love it.

So ya. I doubt ill barley ever update in here anymore cept on a special occasion.
For example..6 days.

MINE AND KEVINS 6 MONTH!! YES!!!! 

Ok anyways..so you can keep updated on my stupid pointless life..heres the link. 
This is my life.

www.xanga.com/cutting_to_invisibility

there yeez go.
much love.

Its been almost exactly a week since i updated.
To much has happened to remember or write.

I just know that school last week was awesome.
Everything has been going pretty good since the last lock-in.
Wow. i think its a record.
god..im just so happy.
Idky. I just..havent been able to stop smiling since last weekend.
heh.

Anywayzz--
Im not going into my whole week last week.
Theres to much.
Ill just start from..hmm...i guess friday.

Friday--
Eddie didnt go to school.
So i didnt see him.
When i got home i did my hw and he came over.
We hung out on my front porch.
Eventually Courtney and Kendra came over.
Then Carlos.

Kevin couldnt cuz he had to help his mom w/ a garage sale then he went to a dumb concert.
hmm...
I wonder..hah.

We had alot of fun.
We just messed aroudn all day.
I really dont remember in detail everything that happened.
'Cept that Carlos gave me a gage for my ear.
Its only like a 14 or 16(katie said it was a 14)
But i still did it.
And i guess its awesome.
Now i still have to get my belly done.
After over 5 months of begging, i better get it done 2mrrw.
Everytime my mom says shes gonna take me she backs out.
It makes me mad.

Eventually though everyone left cept me and kendra.
The josh clark came over.
We walked around for awhile.
Sang a lil' bit of ICP.
And just hung out.
Then i had to go home and go in to eat dinner.

I talked on the phone to Eddie for awhile.
Then i felt really bad.
I layed down and went to sleep.
I wanted to wait up for kevin to call me but i just couldnt.
I was so sick.
My head was spinning.
I just needed rest...I needed him.
But obviously the only thing i got was rest.

Today--
I woke up at like 8am.
Still sick.
I realized kevin called..only once..at like midnight.
I was so upset.
I just wanted to talk to him.
I never see him anymore....its so gay.
I hate it.

Anywayzz--
I went back to sleep and woke up again at like 12:30.
I took a shower and went outside w/ a bunch of people.
I saw kevin off and on all day.
I guess i was sorta happy.
...sorta...

We hung out all day.
I was suppossed to go w/ kendra to columbus but my mom didnt want me to go if there were no parents.
Then she said that i didnt wanna go.
I honestly couldve cared less if i went or not.
Just blame everything on me...

Then everyone left and i came in.
My mom was being a bitch.
But whats new.

Later on tonight people are comin over to hang out.
Hopefully my mom will be drunk.
Itll help everything out sooo much.

Kevins not gonan be home all night.
I probably cant see him 2mrrw.
I cant see him the rest of the week.
Cant see him next friday cuz hes going to a stupid concert.
Oh well.
My friends have been a good target for replacing him when i miss him..

I just wish i could talk to him and see him more.
Thats all i want.

So muhc has happened.
So much has changed.
Im really confused, but yet so happy.
Ive never been this happy.
Even w/o him near me...ive never been so content..so happy.
Its weird.

But ya.

2mrrw is the last day of my funfilled (not) weekend.
Im gonna make the best of it.
Idk what im doing but its gonna be a pimpin day i can tell you that.
..At least i hope..

Well, right now im talking to Brian and waiting on people to come over.
Bored as hell.
So im out for now.

Ill update again whenever i remember.

Later.

Much love<33

w00pw00p!!
last night was fucking awesome!!!!!!
omg omg. !! it was great.

Anywayzz--
Today i met Daniel and Eddie up at Kmart.
I saw kevin a little bit before then headed off to kmart.
We got there and we hung out.
It was superkoolfun.

Eventually Daniel had to leave at like...3:30
So Eddie and I walked around then decided to head back to the Acres.
Springer passed us in a car.
But im not talking to him so ya..who cares.
So we kept walkin' and we stopped at Josh Clarks house to see him and kevin.
We ended up walking to kevins w/ him and messin' around a bit. 
Then we went to my house to get a drink.

We walked Eddie out of the neighborhood and i went home by myself.
I talked on the phone.
Watched tv and ate.

Eventually people came over for my mom.
I ate dinner and then went outside w/ Kyra, Kendra, and Courtney.
We went down to kevins and hung out.
Soon we saw Bryon weiss and his friend.
It was fun.

We hung out. 
I went home.
Talked on the phone.
Got in a fight w/ Springer.
Ya..ya..and now here i am. Eatin and talking to kevin and..his dad lol.

Well..gotta hit it.
Love ya much.

Later.

Well i went to the mall and Lockin friday.
It was awesome!!!!
Usually i dont like being aroudn a huge group of people.
But at the mall, it seemed like i was always w/ everyone.
It was awesome.
I saw shank, mara, stephani, joe, andy,tahnee, and tons of others.
It was the greatest!!

Zach rode the bus home w/ me Friday and went to the mall w/me.
It was fun.
Then at the mall we got kicked out.
It was a dumb reason but oh well.
So everyone went walkin to the dollar movies.
I stayed at AMC and called my mom to pick me up.

I met these two chicks there.
Holly and Kelly.
They were kinda preppy.
One of them was getting stood up.
Felt bad for her. Dumbass guy.
Then these boys were knockin on the window at her. lol
Bet she felt loved.
We talked about stuff. Mostly school, b/f's, friends, ect.
Talked about how i got kicked out of the mall.
Everything.

It was fun. Then my mom showed up.
I left the chicks and kevin called.
We talked. 
Then i talked to kendra.
When i got home i went down to kevins and hung out.
Swept his room.
Ect.

I stayed till 10:30 i think and we left and went off to the lockin.
Daniel called me 2x that night.
I was surprised.
We are starting to hang out again which really makes me happy.

Anywayzz--
We got there and i saw a bunch of my friends.
I saw Danny too.
I dont even think he knew who i was but now he does im sure lol.
So we got our braclets and just hung out.
Mostly i hung in the dance room w/ Sean, Mike, and Eddie.
I was soooo effin hyper it wasnt funny.
I couldnt sit still and had to be running around the whole time.

So thats what we did. 
Then i hung out w/ Daniel a whole whole lot.
And w/ Brian, Derek, and Spencer a little.
It was awesome.
I was right where i wanted to be.
In the middle of the fun.
W/ all of my friends.
..well..most of them..
and it was awesome.

Sean kinda started a little ''dance off'' in the dance room.
We took pictures.
It was cool.
He smoked every wigger in the place!!
It was awesome!! lol

We hung out the rest of the night mostly outside or upstairs.
Then somethin happened to katie.
I was worried but i couldnt do anything.
So i didnt stay w/ her and crystal.
oh todd and kevin too.
I just couldnt look at her the way she was acting.
Noone understands why. 
But oh well.
They can be mad at me for not being there...i really dont care.
I have my reasons.

Anywayzz--
Kevin got mad at me i think.
But thats ok cuz idc about that either.
I had the best night ive ever had in months so i really dont care.
Then when i got tired out i was going to lay by kevin but heh..no..
It was really crowded w/ people and him and crystal were less than an inch apart.
There was no room for me to even try.
So i layed down between Derek and Brian while we talked about Eddie and Daniel.

Eventually alot of people left.
I said my goodbyes.
And stood with Daniel and talked.
Then kevin woke up so we went outside to wait on our parents.
My mom showed up quickly.
hugs.
Then left.
He forgot his keys so it took him awhile to get inside.
But i didnt care.
I tried to fall asleep in the backside while we waited to make sure he was in.

I got home and it took awhile to sleep.
Eddie, mike, and sean called me and we talked a little.
Mara called and we talked a little. 
And tons of others called.
I fell asleep.
I woke up at 10.
Went back to sleep at 1.
And slept the rest of the day.
Woke up at 3:30 and ate dinner.

Then joe and me tried to find a way to the mall w/ a bunch of people.
It didnt happen.
Then i wanted to talk to or see kevin but go figure...im the last thing on his mind.
I miss him like hell.
He doesnt understand that i want to be w/ him...
But honestly, i think he could care less.
Specially as long as he has certain people in his life.

Oh well. 
They wont always be there for him.
i will..unless he fucks me over the way that i think he will..

So i talked on the phone.
Called Kevin.
He couldnt talk cuz for heavens sake he had to call his cousin so now idk where he is.
But oh well.
2mrrw im gonna hang out w/ my new friends and if he wants to see me..well..
he can kiss my ass.

But for now im out.
Lotsa Love.


Later.

We went back to school monday. God it sucked. I woke up early, but only cuz i had a bad dream. I freaked out and couldnt sleep. I had noone to talk to. Noone to call. So ya.. I woke up and got ready to go back to hell. School. Bluh. I saw all my friends. I missed them alot. Some of them anyways. It was an awesome day i guess. I had fun. Got along w/ everyone. That i remember anyways. But idk. Could be forgetting something. I was supossed to get my belly pierced too and didnt yet. Idk what to do. Lockin or belly ring? I need to get out of the house for awhile. Im leaning towards lockin...belly later. Dunno yet though. --I just need to get out of this house.-- Get away. I cant sit here all week, or till whenever. Just being bored. I need shit to do. Everything just seems so pointless to do now. All i want to do is stay home..or be w/ kevin. But i know i cant. Anywayzz-- The rest of the week has been ''ok'' so far. And what did happen..well thats staying w/ me. The bad things anyways. Well, 2mrrw idk whats goin' down. Hopefully somethin' awesome. Then friday im mallin' again. Just for Shank!! lol Happy Early B-day Shank!! Its saturday. and ya. So thats all for now. Gotta hit it. Love much.

Well, after i updated earlier i went outside w/ Kendra. Then Springer ended up over here like every day so far of break. It was fun. We did so much stupid stuff it wasnt even funny. Kevin didnt get home until like forever. And then crystal and katie came over and saw us. It was fun. Crystals hair looks weird...heh. Well, thats all i have to say about that subject. Anywayzz-- I walked around w/ kendra for awhile after josh left. Then i saw Robert, Big Corey, some dude, and Taylor. It was the first time iver ever met her. Shes really pretty. Her and robert look really happy. Hope they are. So kendra and I went down to kevins and they were all there. They talked. I mostly listened. I talked to Ashley a little though. So it was ok. I wasnt that lonely. Then everyone left but Kevin, Kendra, Ashley, and I. We hung out. Then they all went in but kevin and kendra left. I stayed there and we talked and hung out until like 8:30. It was fun. I Love spending time w/ him... Its me favorite time of day. But anyways, he walked me home. I came in and ate. And talked to Michael and Springer on the phone. And now im talkin' to people and on the phone w/ Springer...fun. Im listening to music too. Fun. Debating on what to do Friday. I get my belly pierced 2mrrw!! WOOHOO!! Well, gotta hit it. Almost 10. School 2mrwr. Much Love To My Homies. x-x-xTiffyx-x-x

On Easter Kevin came over and hung out. 
We had sooo much fun.
Then the rest of my break i saw him maybe 2 times.
It sucked.

Then a bunch of drama happened which totally ruined my break.
But i soon got over it.
Well, no..i take that back..im still not really over it, 
but more important stuff took over my head.

I dont really remember much of what happened over my break, honestly.
There was too many things.
Too much.
But i do know that kevin and i got into it more than once.
It sucked but what am i supossed to do?
I try to work it out w/ him but it never goes that good.

Too much stuff happened w/ me and him over break to even go into.
I just know if i loose him again, idk what ill do.
Hes everything to me.

Anywayzz--
Last night Kendra went up to Tony's.
I wanted to go but couldnt.
It sucked.
I was supossed to go somewhere w/ Springer but it didnt work out.
So i stayed home.

I talked on the phone w/ Tony and Kendra.
Got i love that boy.
i miss him soooo much....
Then i met this new guy.
One of Tony's friends.
Moffitt. Idk how to spell it but thats how it sounds.

He seems really cool.
I want to meet him.
Im sure i will by the end of summer.
Dunno though.
Hoping...

Then i stayed up and talked all night online w/ the voice thingy.
W/ Zach and Tyler.
It was fun.
Kevin has church today and its almost 4.
Hes not home, well at least noone will answer.
Ive saw him 3 times over break and all i wanted to do was spend my last w/ him...
Oh well.
Thats not gonna happen.

I was supossed to get my belly pierced today!!
My mom finally agreed after months and months of begging and watching my friends get it and me not being able too.
I have almost enough money.
In fact i think i do have enough.
But i cant go to the lockin friday if i do it.
Oh well, ill spend my Josh!! lol
Thatll be fun.

Maybe ill go mallin' and such.
Most likely.
Might see a movie.
Just hang alone.
Who knows.
I guess ill find out when the time comes.

Well, i dont want to get my belly pierced today...
I do but i missed my chance cuz i dont wanna go alone.
I want kevin to go w/ me...but he has to be at church at 4 fuckin oclock w/ Ash, Katie, and Crystal.
Hmmmm....oh well.
Ill go tomorrow, and im SURE it will be alone...
Like always....

Maybe ill see if Josh wants to go.....

Well, gotta hit it.
Im outta here.

Later.

x-x-xTiffany-x-x

Latley everything has been going great. Family, friends, school..ya you get it. Katie and i are getting closer again. Little Katie. Kevin and i are doing good..uhhh yaa. Anywayzz-- Last night was the 1st night i hung out w/ Tahnee. Shes really cool. Glad im getting to know her. We all went to the mall. I saw Stan, Joey, Johnni, everyone was there. It was pretty fun. I spent most of my time w/ stan. Lookin' at posters and different things like that. Stan, John, and I saw a clown at the mall. It was fat and had purple hair. haha Well, i ended up getting sick at the mall. Like dieing sick. I felt like i was going to die. I couldnt move w/o being in pain, but i didnt want to leave. So i just walked around. Then John, Kevin, and Tahnee got kicked out. I wanted to hang w/ them and wasnt gonna just leave them by theirselves so i left w/ them. We walked around and stuff. I was feeling a little better too. Then i felt sick again. We went to Best Buy to look for the new ABK cd. I saw Aaron Pruitt there. Wow. its been awhile. He was laughing at me. Probably cuza Kevin. Oh well. We left and went back to the mall. I called my mom and told her i was really sick. She needed to come pick us up. So we sat and waited. Then john had to leave. Right after that we left too. Then here comes the fun...not. Stupid church peoplez, teenagers, whatever, had the great idea to drive out in front of us. Smart...sooooo smart.. I think everyone can fill in the blanks after that. The stupid car hit us. Crash. Blah. All i wanted to do was go home and sleep. And they ruined my plans. Thanks soooo much. Anywayzz-- We took Tahnee home after cops came, swapped insurance, ect. Then we took kevin home. Then i went home. I went straight to the bathroom then bed. Talked on the phone to kevin a little bit, but i had no energy left to get online. So i ended up falling asleep.. Then my mom woke me up for whitecastles. Fun. So ya..fun filled first day of spring break. Idk if im gonna do much the rest of it.. Doubtful. But idk. But peoplez are calling my cell so i gotta hit it. Love much. Later. x-x-xTiffanyx-x-x

Today has been boring.
I just came inside about an hour ago from walking around.
Its cold..brrrrr!

Anywayzz--
School was just about normal. 
Katie and i talked more than usual though.
Our little sister relationship is coming back.
I guess everything is slowly getting better.
But thats what i though last week too.
Who knows.

Zach and Brenda broke up.

James left and Aj and I went in to eat Wendy's. Then Kendra and Katie came over. Little Katie. We hung out. Pictures. Cuddles. hehe. Fun stuff. Then Alicia came over. Kendra left. And we hung out on the computer for awhile. Then...time for acts. Which my mom FORCED us to go to. I told her no i didnt wanna go. But she wouldnt listen. Go figure. Nothin new. So we went and actually, had an AWESOME time. It was ALOT funner than usual. I made alot of new friends within the hours i was there. God i loved it. And in the end I was pretty happy my mom made us go. My Katie crowd surfed for the first time!! w00t w00t!! go katie!! Anyways. Katies mom picked us all up and took us to Aj's. We went in and met his mom. I saw his baby brother who is soooo adorable. Then it was time for us to come home. So we said out goodbyes to him and all came to my house. I lost my voice and got really sick. So we didnt do that much when we got home. They both spent the night. Well..theres my Super Cool Friday. Saturday-- I woke up w/ absolutley NO VOICE. Eventually it slowly started to come back, but i was really horse. I talked to my bub. Big Joe. And he gave me some ideas of how to get it back within the hours. It came back very little. I tried everything. Theraflu. Salt water. Throat spray. Cough syrup. Dayquil. Tea w/ honey and lemon(alicias idea) and Hot sauce! Ajs mom said it would work lol. It kinda did. lol. Took forever for me to try it though. So it came back a little. And then...I had to go to Ajs for dinner. Wow. I was so Fucking scared it wasnt even funny. I was shaking and katie was laughing at me. Well, i got ready VERY quickly. I was rushing around like crazy. I coudnt calm down. Then, I heard the cardoors and a minute later they were at the door. They came in and chit chatted w/ my momma for a bit. Then we left. Went to the store. Then back to his house. We talked. Cuddled. Kissed. So on and so forth. It was awesome. He is soooo romantic...hehe. And really sweet. Such a gentleman. Hes freakin awesome. Not like anyone ive ever been w/ before. Gosh..its great. I played w/ his kittie and then his dog. Cookie. It was fun. Then..dinner time. We ate and watched a movie w/ his mom and stepdad. It was called the Collateral i THINK. None of us really remembered. It was pretty good. It was kinda violent in a way..but hey.what isnt these days? We talked a little during the movie and dinner. Then, after the movie was over. Aj and i headed upstairs to his room. We hung out for a half an hour or so until it was about 11:00. Then my mom called to get directions. And awhile after the doorbell rang. I said my goodbyes and left. So sad..._tears_ I miss him already. :[ Then my mom and i went to kroger. I stayed in the car and listened to the radio. She came out and we talked about my night and laughed. Then we went home and brought in the groceries to once leave again. We went to meijer and i bought me a cd called Headbangers Ball Vol.2. Its a pretty good cd. It has A Perfect Circle, Korn, Slipknot, Kittie, HIM, Bleeding Through, Lamb of God, and alot more. I also got an adorable black skirt. It it very cute.
